title: D401 AI Camera
metaTitle: D401 Intelligent AI Camera | FleetGoo ADAS
metaDesc: D401 AI Camera with advanced ADAS and DMS capabilities for proactive fleet safety.
fullDescription: The D401 is an intelligent AI camera designed to enhance fleet safety. It features built-in ADAS (Advanced Driver Assistance Systems) to detect lane departures and forward collisions, alongside DMS (Driver Monitoring System) to alert against fatigue and distraction.
features: DMS: Fatigue, Distraction, Smoking, Phone usage detection
packaging: 1x D401 Camera, 1x Power Cable, 1x Bracket, 1x User Manual
